posts.postText:
Yes, when ever I start my computer, explorer.exe is running but not working like, its not doing its job.

I have to open task manager to kill it then I have to start it again. Any ideas?


 Edit: I also have a bot.exe that I managed to disable using CACKLES method, I just can't delete it off my system, any help with that also?
I had that problem too... you could write a script and set it to auto-run that kills explorer then restarts it. Or just use sleep/hibernate.
Problem is, I don't know how to make a script, and I can't use hibernate because the computer is in my moms room and she sleeps in it :|

type run in your start up bar
select run from programs
type in msconfig
go to startup
select what programs you want to open up on restart
????
Profit
you could also format and reinstall windows since you likely have spyware/keylogger/shitware.
